cancelTask

public void cancelTask(LidaTask task)
Description copied from interface: TaskSpawner
Cancels the task from the task queue. This is only possible if the tick for witch the task is scheduled has not been reached.

Specified by:
cancelTask in interface TaskSpawner
Parameters:
task - The task to cancel.

receiveFinishedTask

public void receiveFinishedTask(LidaTask task)
Description copied from interface: TaskSpawner
This method receives the tasks that have finished. Each TaskSpawner can choose what to do with each LidaTask each time it finished to run one step. Generally the LidaTask's status commands this action.

Specified by:
receiveFinishedTask in interface TaskSpawner
Parameters:
task - finished LidaTask

init

public void init()
Description copied from interface: Initializable
This is a convenience method to initialize Tasks. It is called from init(Map parameters). Subclasses can overwrite this method in order to initialize the LidaTask
